abstract: Vikram S. Pandit, Citigroup’s chief executive, sounded rather upbeat on Friday about his bank’s ability to absorb losses in revenue caused by the new financial regulations passed by Congress.
snippet: Vikram S. Pandit, Citigroup’s chief executive, sounded rather upbeat on Friday about his bank’s ability to absorb losses in revenue caused by the new financial regulations passed by Congress.
lead_paragraph: Vikram S. Pandit, Citigroup’s chief executive, sounded rather upbeat on Friday about his bank’s ability to absorb losses in revenue caused by the new financial regulations passed by Congress, in contrast to the feelings of heavy concern at rival banks like JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America.

headline.main: Pandit Says Citigroup Can Absorb Curbs on Fees
